reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars WITH A LITTLE IMPROVEMENT, THIS COULD BE NOMINATED FOR THE PRODUCT OF THE YEAR
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying this is a super clever idea. I detest paying for carry-on bags and when you’re traveling for a few days or more, it’s hard to fit all the essentials in a “personal item” bag that must fit under the seat. That’s where this neck cushion comes into play. You stuff it with clothes. I’ve got three undershirts, some socks, and underpants all stuffed in one of these and it not only frees up space in my “personal item” bag, but I now have a neck pillow so I can catch some zees on those painful red-eyes.Here’s my one recommendation for improvement. I have a big neck and even with the chin strap set to the maximum tightness, it’s too loose. Don’t worry about me. I’ve got a large safety pin to snug it up. But if the design allowed the chin strap to be about three inches tighter, it would be a perfect product and I’d be willing to nominate it for the air-traveler’s product of the year. Just don’t back your dirty clothes in it for the return flight or you might not get much sleep.As a bonus, this is a two-pack: one for me and one for my traveling companion.
